Posts.Content: solomon wrote: I recently found a lump in my right breast. I have since seen my dr. that felt it. She said it moves and was about 1 inch. That same day I had a sonogram. The lady that did the sonogram could feel it with her hands and every time she moved the sonogram wand to get a picture. I received a call from my doctor today saying that everything was normal and that she wanted to see me back in 3 months. I'm a nervous wreck thinking about the what ifs. Should I get a second opinion? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lump found but didn't show on sonogram solomon dtad
